CreateSelectionDistributionUtils
internal static
CreateSelectionDistributionUtils​<T>
where T : struct

Static utility methods for creating instances of DiscreteDistribution that describe genome and species selection probabilities.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Functions
CreateSelectionDistributions
public static void CreateSelectionDistributions(
Species<T>[] speciesArr,
out DiscreteDistribution speciesDist,
out DiscreteDistribution?[] genomeDistArr,
out int nonEmptySpeciesCount
)

Create instances of DiscreteDistribution for sampling species, and for genomes within each given species.

Parameters
speciesArr
Species<T>[]

Species array.

speciesDist
out DiscreteDistribution

Returns a new instance of DiscreteDistribution for sampling from the species array.

genomeDistArr
out DiscreteDistribution?[]

Returns an array of DiscreteDistribution, for sampling from genomes within each species.

nonEmptySpeciesCount
out int

Returns the number of species that contain at least one genome.

Create a DiscreteDistribution that describes the probability of each species being selected, for cross species reproduction.

Parameters
speciesArr
Species<T>[]

Species array.

nonEmptySpeciesCount
out int

Returns the number of species that contain at least one genome.

A new instance of DiscreteDistribution for sampling from the species array.
